item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 18, 2024 at 6:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. High-speed trader Jane Street raked in $4.4bn at start of 2024
2. Boeing engineer says safety concerns are ignored inside plane maker
3. Tesla asks shareholders to approve move to Texas and ratify Musk’s pay
4. US House moves closer to vote over aid for Ukraine and Israel
5. US deficit poses ‘significant risks’ to global economy, warns IMF
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 18, 2024 at 6:45 AM UTC
